amendment.description: To authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to provide technical assistance relating to a disaster caused by a volcanic eruption.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3406 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3406 proposed by Senator Moran for Senator Schatz to Amendment SA 3399. (consideration: CR S5499-5503; text: CR S5499) To authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to provide technical assistance relating to a disaster caused by a volcanic eruption.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3406 proposed by Senator Moran for Senator Schatz to Amendment SA 3399.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3406 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
